Must be called before all other gkSound functions.
classitems.name: init

params.name: autoCreateMuteButton
params.description: Enable to create a default mute button.

params.name: muteButtonConteiner
params.description: Id of an element.

classitems.description: Verify if browser supports MP3 file.
classitems.name: hasMP3Support

classitems.description: Verify if browser supports OGG file.
classitems.name: hasOGGSupport

classitems.description: Load sound. Simple away to add sound in your page. Supports MP3 and OGG files.
classitems.name: addSound

params.name: id
params.description: Id to new Audio element.

params.name: file
params.description: File name can be with or without extension name.

params.name: isTrack
params.description: Boolean default false. Set to true to play sound with loop.

params.name: autoPlay
params.description: Boolean default false. Set to true to play sound when is loaded.

params.name: callback
params.description: Callbacks return an Object like { message:"Sound loaded.", code:0 }. These codes are according HTML5 specifications.

params.name: id
params.description: of Audio element.

classitems.description: Load sound. Simple away to add sound in your page. Supports MP3 and OGG files.
classitems.name: playSound

params.name: id
params.description: Id of Audio element.

params.name: override
params.description: Boolean default false. Set to true to play sound from start.

params.name: callback
params.description: Callbacks return an Object like { message:"Sound played.", code:0 }. Code will be -1 if sound not played.

params.name: ignoreMute
params.description: Boolean default false. Set to true to play sound ignoring mute settings.

classitems.description: Play all sounds previously stopped by pauseAllSounds.
classitems.name: resumeAllSounds

params.name: id
params.description: Id of Audio element.

params.name: id
params.description: Id of Audio element.

params.name: value
params.description: Number between 0 and 1.

params.name: isRelative
params.description: Boolean default false. Set to true to apply value like a relative.

params.name: id
params.description: Id of Audio element.

params.name: value
params.description: Number between 0 and 1.

params.name: isRelative
params.description: Boolean default false. Set to true to apply value like a relative.

params.name: id
params.description: Id of Audio element.
